<column gap="tiny">

**Bulk** L

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Light Hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=29)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

This ordinary-looking silver tankard functions as a _+4 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [hopeful](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1381) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [light hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=29)_ when wielded as a weapon. Imbued with [Cayden Cailean's](/Deities.aspx?ID=4) courage, you are immune to [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects. Any liquid poured into the tankard transforms into a strong, alcoholic ambrosia that remains contained safely within until you drink it. Drinking the ambrosia Activates the tankard, with one of the following effects. If you aren't the one blessed to borrow the tankard, you are [drained 4](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and [enfeebled 4](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) while holding it, and its magic doesn't function for you.

<document level="2" id="action-1924" />

<document level="2" id="action-1925" />

<document level="2" id="action-1926" />

**Destruction** If a lawful evil creature carries _Cayden's Tankard_ into the Starstone Cathedral, drinks from it, and returns outside with it, the tankard shatters.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
